subject: Management
title: Task vs Relationship Conflict
description: A quick, practical guide to Task vs Relationship Conflict.

hook.text: Two engineers debated architecture for hours. One walked away energized. The other felt personally attacked.

buildup.text: Task conflict is about what to do. Relationship conflict is about who you are.

discovery.text: Research shows task conflict improves outcomes. Relationship conflict destroys them.

twist.text: The danger: task conflict easily slides into relationship conflict when emotions escalate.

climax.text: Keep it about the idea, not the person. Attack the problem, never the colleague.

punchline.text: Disagree with the idea. Respect the person.

quiz.question: What is the key difference between task and relationship conflict?
options: Task conflict is about ideas; relationship conflict is personal
Task conflict is always destructive while relationship conflict helps
They are the same thing expressed differently
